content.text: Hello! I am an arctic explorer. I used to be a geology teacher, but I got more interested in ice. I know how to ice fish and I like to hunt for polar bears for food. I strive to find long lost arctic explorers and return them home.
Hello! I like to take and post selkies. I like to dance at the club. I have a big sweet tooth. I run a dog obedience school.
It sounds like we have some things in common! I also like to dance at the club and I have a big sweet tooth.
That's great! What kind of music do you like to dance to?
I like all kinds of music, but I especially like to dance to electronic music.
Me too! I love to dance to house music and techno.
Those are my favorites too! We should go dancing together sometime.
That would be fun!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go dancing at the club and I love to run.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I also like to dance, but I'm not very good at it.
Don't worry, you'll get better with practice.
Thanks, I hope so.
What do you do for work?
I run a dog obedience school. I love working with dogs and I'm passionate about animal welfare.
That's great! I'm sure you're a great dog trainer.
Thank you! I love my job.
Do you have any pets?
I have two dogs, a golden retriever and a labrador retriever. They're my best friends.
That sounds adorable! I've always wanted a dog, but I'm not sure if I'm ready for the responsibility.
Dogs are a lot of work, but they're also a lot of fun. If you're ever ready to make the commitment, I highly recommend it.
Thanks for the advice! I'll keep it in mind.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about dogs
